programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 138
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 137
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 26
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 65
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Dwayne Johnson ("Jumanji: The Next Level"). Chrissy Teigen helps with Ellen's 12 Days of Giveaways.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is J. Jumping Jellybeans are jumping from planet to planet, disrupting the residents of the alphabet planets.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 15
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero travel to Peru to take a marvellous spatuletail home. But what can they do when the hungry bird falls into a deep sleep? A trip to the rainforest becomes necessary when a clouded leopard cub turns up in the garden. The Junior Rangers search for the cub's mother, but are set back when the cub gets entangled in some tree vines above water.

programme.title: Tree Fu Tom S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: A fantasy, action-adventure series which follows the amazing adventures of a young boy, Tom.

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S6 - EP 3
programme.desc: Pororo, the mischievous penguin lives in a village on a far far away island with his unlikely friends. No one knows how they ended up on the island, but they've got to stick together and make the best of it.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 15
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 16
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Super Wings S4: Super Charge - EP 31
programme.desc: Jett, the adorable little red plane, continues his adventures and missions all around the world!

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien are chosen to become Paris superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers. Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth - who wants to steal their Miraculouses - from wreaking havoc on the town.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends - EP 3
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S1 - EP 29
programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 7

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 13

programme.title: 数学荒岛历险记 S4 Math's Island S4 - EP 13
programme.desc: In this new series, Luke and his buddies met a new friend, CODEMAO. They help the residents of the town to solve their problems using the power of programming and mathematics, and the use of intelligence technology changes their lives. 在这新系列,故事讲述罗克和小伙伴们遇到了新的朋友编程猫，大家一起帮助小镇的居民们，使用编程和数学的力量解决问题，让小镇越来越智能化，智能科技改变了人们的生活。.

programme.title: 玩具不插电 Toys Unplugged - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the hosts visit the only local kampong in Singapore and introduce a classic game - chapteh. They experience machinery operation at a simulated construction site. The hosts learn how to handmade teddy bear from the teddy bear expert and also teach audience how to make water rockets. (重)这一集，主持人走访新加坡仅存的甘榜，介绍经典游戏踢毽子！接着前往模拟建筑工地，体验操作小型建筑机械。另外，主持人也请来手制玩具熊专家，介绍手制玩具熊的特点。最后，他们将指导如何制作好玩、刺激的水火箭！.

programme.title: 聚爱圆梦 The Wish - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) 2-year old Amelia suffers from a rare genetic disease that has left her unable to communicate and move by herself. She needs to be cared for 24-7 by her mother and sister. Will they be able to overcome her physical challenges, and fulfil her wishes of seeing snow and meeting her heroes in person? (重)两岁的芯方患有一种罕见的遗传病，使她无法与人沟通和行动。 她的母亲和妹妹需要全天照顾她。他们是否能够帮芯方克服体能的问题，并实现她见雪的愿望和见到英雄愿望呢？.

programme.title: 宅星刀叉战 #StayHomeCookOff - EP 1

Their challenge is to whip up a tasty dish using chicken meat and other ingredients that they can find in their kitchens. Hanwei admits that he doesn't really cook, so does that mean Vivian will have the upper hand? (重)第一集的厨艺PK赛，迎来了两位超级红星 陈汉玮和赖怡伶，他们的挑战是用指定食材“鸡肉”配搭家里现有的材料，煮出一道“宅星料理”，到底他们的厨艺如何？谁的厨艺作品更胜一筹？平时极少下厨的汉玮，又会带给大家怎样的惊喜？敬请期待两位宅星的厨艺刀叉战！.

programme.title: 星光灿烂 The Glittering Days - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Xu Wen Hui is a popular singer who was forced to take part in all sorts of singing competition by her adopted father, Jin Long. He treats Wen Hui like a money making machine. She became withdrawn and temperamental. By her own talents, Wen Hui became a very established singer but it did not last long. (PG)(重)当红流行歌手徐雯蕙因绯闻遭唱片公司解约，养父蔡金龙强迫她投靠她的生母苏小小。主演：龚慈恩，陈凤玲，童冰玉。.

(重)每个人都有自己熟悉的经典歌曲，每个人都带着各自的故事踏上这个舞台。《Astro经典名曲歌唱大赛2019》延续有歌曲有故事，让你继续动容。今年的经典名曲歌唱大赛同样召集了一群热爱唱歌的朋友，并且以初衷、梦想、勇敢、蜕变和荣耀五个音乐元素，让基因重组，拼发出音乐的力量。.

(PG)(重)号称天下第一青楼的品花楼招收丫鬟。烈如歌隐瞒身份，被花大娘录用。花魁风细细指定要如歌伺候她，并要如歌帮自己抢到贵客 - 天下无刀城少主刀无暇 - 以便在名花榜上压过另一花魁凤凰。.

Despite being a man, Yin Xue's unsurpassed beauty attracts the attention of all the guests at the brothel. He chooses Ruge to be his lifetime partner but Ruge hesitates, as she already has someone in her heart. (PG)(重) 烈火山庄二弟子玉自寒为了查探师妹烈如歌的下落，现身品花楼。公认天下第一“美人”的品花楼头牌花魁银雪消失数年也意外现身。银雪虽然是个男子，但风华绝代，吸引了大厅里所有宾客的目光。银雪宣称要在当晚“择一明主，生死相随”。随后，银雪指定了如歌相伴终身。如歌犹豫不定，因为她已经心有所属。.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 20

Qingchen planned to use the celebration night to get close to Yuanming, whom she wanted to investigate. (PG-性相关语)(重)元湛把舞坊改造成医馆送给卿尘，卿尘为表达对元湛的感谢，提议领着众姐妹为诸位皇子献上歌舞，目的是想设计入凤府。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 391
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei and Guan Ming meets a client who pressures them to drink. Xia Luo Ke sends the photos of them drinking to Zi Jun and Zi Jun's face darkens. He decides to wait for her downstairs and sees Guan Ming sending Sen Mei home. Zi Jun brings Sen Mei back home, both parties blame one another and starts an argument. Zi Jun accuses Sen Mei of having an affair with Guang Ming and Sen Mei is taken aback. (PG)(重)森美与冠铭见客户，为应酬而不得已喝酒。夏洛克将两人喝酒的照片传给子骏，子骏脸色一沉，到楼下等待，果然见到冠铭送森美回来。子骏带森美回家，夫妻俩互相指责，最后吵起来。子骏脱口说出森美与冠铭有染之事，森美感错愕！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 22
programme.desc: (Part 2) The Hospital management decides to perform a joint organ transplant surgery for three patients at the same time. (PG)(第22集下)明成北要进行同时为三位病人移植器官的联合手术，唐明竟让抛下手术刀已久的仲学参与。众人对唐明的决定感到惊讶。。。。。。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 7
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 云林有全台湾最大的蔬果市场，有70%的蔬菜都来自于它。而每一种蔬菜的采收方式都不一样，为了拿到最新鲜的食材，詹姆士亲自体验采收蔬菜。令人惊讶的不只是这些，你有吃过内藏干贝的碗粿吗？霸王级的碗粿、一瓶要价1900元的酱油、夜来香花竟然是可以吃的？这些不可思议的新发现，都让詹姆士惊叹连连。.

programme.title: 剃头刀 阿签传奇 Titoudao: Inspired by the True Story of a Wayang Star - EP 1
programme.desc: Ah Chiam who grew up in a village, was often beaten up and scolded by her father, who suspects that Ah Chiam was born after the Japanese Army sexually assaulted his wife. His wife died while giving birth, causing her father to vent his anger on Ah Chiam, pointing that she brings bad luck to the family, chasing her away....... (PG-部分画面令人不安)生长在农村的阿签从小不被父亲喜爱，经常遭打骂，因父亲怀疑她是妻子遭日军性侵后所生下来的，甚至想把她丢弃或卖掉，只有妈妈维护和经常鼓励她。但妈妈却在生产时难产而死，父亲将气发泄在阿签身上，指她给这个家带来不幸，将她赶走……。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Did you know? Yishun was previously known as Chye Kay Village, besides historical traces of the village, you could also explore Singapore's only Turtle and Tortoise Museum! In 1930s, Sembawang used to be British Empire's naval base, come along with our hosts to uncover unexpected finds in this area! (重)你知道吗？义顺新镇的前身叫“财启村”，而大牌 101是义顺新镇的第一栋组屋。以前的黄梨山，现在变成户外乐园，还有世界唯一的活龟博物馆。三巴旺曾经是英国皇家的军事重地，著名的地标除了英殖民地时期留下来的黑白屋，还有售卖手工糕饼的传统饼家。.

Find out how The Wish team helped Sayfullah's digital talents gain public recognition. 15岁的賽夫拉患有脑瘫，这种疾病严重限制了他的言语和动作。 尽管无法像其他孩子一样参加体育运动和游戏，賽夫拉对艺术和动物有着特殊的热情。让我们看“聚爱圆梦" 团队 如何帮助賽夫拉.,让他的数码的绘画艺术天赋获得公众认可。.

Knowing that her father wants to send her sister, Ah Dui, to wayang troupe, Ah Chiam decides to stop him....... (PG-些许暴力画面)阿签到林家当保姆，照顾顽皮小男孩。阿签照着朋友Mawar的建议，陪小男孩玩游戏，消耗他的体力，让他不再调皮，渐渐获得夫人的认可，开始把她当家人。阿签得知父亲要把妹妹阿对送去戏班，决定回去阻止……。.

programme.desc: (R) Zhao Zilong returns to the gorge and meets an old man who teaches him the finest art of spear fighting. Meantime, Li Quan decides to marry off his daughter, Li Feiyan, to Zilong. (PG)(重)赵子龙重返绝命谷，谷中老人与他演练长枪的各种作战招式，促使子龙的武功突飞猛进。与此同时，李全决定将女儿飞燕许配给赵子龙。.

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. (重)李易与永烈在韩国遇到史上最大难题！竟然要用国宝人参来做料理？！为突破难关，两人到处寻找料理灵感，强迫导游公开的隐藏版韩方参鸡汤，22种药材下去熬煮，喝一口竟灵感大开！？从没吃过的炸人参料理，车程再远都愿意！最接地气的街头美食，超强厨师竟藏在马车里？还有料理达人来助阵，五分钟就做出人参创意料理令人大开眼界！.

Knowing that her father wants to send her sister, Ah Dui, to wayang troupe, Ah Chiam decides to stop him....... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)阿签到林家当保姆，照顾顽皮小男孩。阿签照着朋友Mawar的建议，陪小男孩玩游戏，消耗他的体力，让他不再调皮，渐渐获得夫人的认可，开始把她当家人。阿签得知父亲要把妹妹阿对送去戏班，决定回去阻止……。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 126
programme.desc: (R) Man Man feels like leaving Singapore for Hong Kong. Ji Zhou opposes fervently, telling her that she should not head back to a life of uncertainty and destitution. (PG)(重)慢慢忽然有感而发，说自己也应该离开了。原来她放心不下失去音讯的轰天炮，想回香港去。际洲一听，不禁被食物噎着。他强烈反对慢慢回香港，说无论如何都会阻止她再步上邪门外道之路！.

programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei asks Ada about her relationship with Guan Ming, and finds out that she did have an intimate relationship with Guan Ming and his daughter Jazz. Sen Mei asks Guan Ming directly, and because of Sen Mei's continuous questioning, Guan Ming admits that they did have an affair, as Sen Mei was often neglected by her husband, and felt empty. Sen Mei is shocked after knowing that she had once told Guan Ming that they'll never be apart. (PG)(重)森美向Ada探问自己和冠铭的关系，得知自己确实与冠铭及他的女儿Jazz关系密切。森美直接问冠铭，冠铭在森美不断追问下，终于承认两人之间有私情，因森美经常遭丈夫冷落，感到空虚，甚至说要和冠铭永不分离，森美如晴天霹雳！.

programme.title: 宅星刀叉战 #StayHomeCookOff - EP 3
programme.desc: Both Lee Teng & Ben Yeo took up the challenge this week. Having hosted numerous food shows, will Lee Teng be able to out beat Ben Yeo, who is well known for his culinary skills? Let's see what they have in store for us! 这一集，宅星李腾和杨志龙要展开刀叉战！ 平时主持很多美食节目的李腾到底厨艺如何？厨艺精湛的杨志龙会给大家怎样的惊喜？两位艺人如何在限时30分钟内必须用神秘食材“鸡蛋”烹煮出一道料理呢？ 究竟是谁的宅星食谱更诱人？记得锁定节目！.

programme.title: 阿贤逛巴刹 Jason's Market Trails S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Host Jason Yeoh explores food markets and street stalls around Malaysia and delves into the human tales and history behind each tasty bite. 跟随阿贤的脚步逛巴刹，在老味道里追寻新的生命力。节目将纪录全马各地巴刹的老滋味，以感受劳动民众一天最早甦醒的好时光。.

programme.title: 剃头刀 阿签传奇 Titoudao: Inspired By The True Story Of A Wayang Star - EP 3
programme.desc: Ah Chiam and Ah Dui join the Wayang Troupe Sin Sai Hong, Ah Chiam puts in effort to learn while Ah Dui is uninterested. Ah Long and Ah Zai are unhappy with Ah Ngor for being late to the show as she was on a date with her boyfriend, thus Ah Long gets Ah Chiam to replace Ah Ngor in order for the show to start on time. Ah Chiam experiences the feeling of being on the stage for the first time. (PG-性相关语)阿签和阿对加入新赛凤歌仔戏团，阿签用心学习，阿对则没有兴趣。班主魏文的哥哥魏成对阿对心怀不轨，乘机接近她。阿娥因与男友约会而演出迟到，令阿隆和阿财不满，为了准时开锣，阿隆让阿签代替阿娥上场，阿签初尝登上舞台的滋味。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 2 Garden Of Treasure S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The focus of the second season of "Garden Of Treasure " include gastrointestinal care, treatment for wound inflammation, hair care, reducing cough and fever symptoms, and care for gynecological issues, so that the audience can more harness the use of herbal medicine. 寻花探草”第二季以寻常病症作为主打，包括肠胃护理、外伤消炎、护发补益、止咳退烧、到妇科调理，让观众能更具体掌握草药的治疗用途。.

programme.title: 最佳利益 Best Interest - EP 12
programme.desc: Fang Zheng and Bo Yun attended the press conference of Guang De Hospital as legal consultants. The hospital is facing charges of negligence in work-related injuries. Fang Zheng and Bo Yun carefully study the records of the operating room of that day and found discrepancies. (PG-些许暴力画面)方筝与博昀以法顾的身分出席广德医院的记者会，院方正面临将工安伤患当作人球处理的控诉。方筝与博昀仔细研究当天手术房的纪录，发现其中有漏洞。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Zilong takes Xiahou Qingyi to a temple where they kneel to a deity and vow to stay with each other forever. As anticipated, the bandits launch a full scale attack on Zhen Ding County. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赵子龙带夏侯轻衣上庙朝拜，两人一起跪在神明的面前发誓，生生世世永不分离。如所意料，山贼终于倾巢而出，猛攻真定县城。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 2 Say It! Sr 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, Gurmit and En Lai visit the food distribution centres to understand what goes behind our imported foodstuff. Will they be able to understand what is going on with their limited Mandarin abilities? (重)我们在新加坡能同时吃到来自世界各地各种各样的食材，全是因为有一群人努力地在我们搜罗、安排进口、处理、保存、到送到市面上的餐厅市场等等！这一回葛米星和蔡恩来就要带大家窥探批发商背后的点滴，学习用华语带出这些有趣的资讯！.

programme.title: Astro 经典名曲歌唱大赛 2019 Astro Classic Golden Melody 2019 - EP 3
programme.desc: "Age is not an issue" is the tagline for this highly-rated singing competition. The show continues to inspire the silver generation to be bold, daring and step out of their comfort zones. 每个人都有自己熟悉的经典歌曲，每个人都带着各自的故事踏上这个舞台。《Astro经典名曲歌唱大赛2019》延续有歌曲有故事，让你继续动容。今年的经典名曲歌唱大赛同样召集了一群热爱唱歌的朋友，并且以初衷、梦想、勇敢、蜕变和荣耀五个音乐元素，让基因重组，拼发出音乐的力量。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 394
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei decides to admit her affair to Zi Jun, but Man Rong stops her, and tells her that it would cause additional harm to Zi Jun. Although Man Rong dissuades Sen Mei, she has other plans on her mind. She deliberately tells Li Qun about Sen Mei's affair, and says that Zi Jun would be in a pitiful state if he remains kept in the dark. She hints that Li Qun should tell Zi Jun about the matter, but Li Qun is hesitant. (PG)(重)森美决定向子骏坦白，曼蓉阻止，说这对子骏是双重伤害。曼蓉表面阻止森美，心里却另有打算。她故意把森美出轨的事告诉立群，指子骏如果一辈子都被蒙在鼓里，似乎很可怜，暗示立群把事情告诉子骏，立群沉吟。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 21

(重)70岁阿嬷陈恩娇因受到女儿影响，两年前开始吃素。热爱烹饪的她，也研究出一些老少咸宜的家常素菜食谱。本集节目，她将传授素羊肉咖喱的做法给主持人钟琴和男嘉宾苏梽诚。不过，阿嬷一见到两位艺人就开骂，接着进厨房，连名厨Chef Charlie都难逃挨骂的“厄运”。究竟发生了什么事？！.

(重)孩子失踪了，怎么办？韩国有大约600个，年龄低于18岁、长期失踪的孩子。他们的父母虽然活在等待和内疚之中，却心存希望的上网、派传单、挂布条，辛苦地找下去。有些家长找了30年、生了病，孩子仍然了无音讯。.

programme.title: 维多利亚的模力 VIC - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Victoria is an industry leader in the real estate sector, an overbearing CEO with an erratic character. She is arrogant and bossy towards her subordinates and reprimands them relentlessly. Victoria bumps into a Vicky en route, who is in a rush. As Vicky is a greenhorn, she offends the narrow-minded Victoria who holds a grudge on Vicky because of it.On the other side, all the contesting models have arrived at the filming set... (PG-些许性相关语)(重)Victoria是一位地产业的霸道总裁，性格飘忽不定，对下属颐指气使，训斥不留情面。获手下Allan通知必须前往参与真人秀节目录制，当嘉宾评审。嘴上对Allan虽百般数落，但是仍前往。在前往途中，遇上了正在赶路的Vicky，初出茅庐的Vicky更是不知就里地得罪了Victoria，让气量狭小的Victoria怀恨在心。另一边厢，众模已抵达拍摄场景，以集宿的方式，参与比赛，但是Vicky却姗姗来迟，遭到节目主持冰冰奚落。众模的第一项挑战就是化妆，但是十人表现，皆被冰冰逐一挑剔，几乎一无是处。众模的比赛初体验遇上了冰冰，见识了这位前超级名模的严厉，纷纷成了噩梦的开始……当晚，正当众人终于松懈下来，享用晚餐之际，Vicky突然收到“粉丝"送来的神秘礼物，岂料…….

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Childhood leukaemia or blood cancer takes at least 2-years to treat. Danny Yeo visits the only hospital in the capital city of Fujian province that provides specialized treatment and holistic care. For financially-strapped families, it's one of the last places to find hope towards complete healing. (重)中国大城市看病贵、看病难，但最好的癌症治疗集中此处。杨君伟陪白血病儿童家庭踏上求医之路，看举目无亲的他们如何在陌生城市安身治病。多亏社会力量，他们才能坚持漫长的抗癌斗争，等孩子痊愈，一起返乡。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 54
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Nayan is sure that Yingshu is harbouring a big secret. She thus searches for clues in Yingshu's room and comes across an old photograph of Jingwan and Yun-ai. Nayan suspects that Jingwan is her biological father. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜妍觉得英淑似乎藏有重大的秘密，于是到英淑的房间找线索，发现英淑藏有一张敬莞和允爱的合照。娜妍怀疑敬莞就是她的生父，悲从中来。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 19
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Zuodou asks to meet Eric to help settle Shengtai's financial problem. Shengzhu finds out that Eric has helped her brother to settle his debt. She looks for Eric anxiously and instead sees Zuodou and Enzhao meeting up with Eric. She realises that Zuodou has revealed his identity to Eric for her sake. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)作斗为了帮胜泰解决财务的事，约艾瑞克见面。胜珠听闻艾瑞克替弟弟还债，急得去找他，却见到作斗、恩照和艾瑞克聚集在一起。她猜到作斗为了她，向艾瑞克坦承身份。.

programme.desc: (R) Aida Azlin came from a small family in Singapore. She got to know her Moroccan husband in UK and they moved to Morocco after getting married. (重)来自新加坡的Aida Azlin，婚后和先生住在摩洛哥。没有亲人、朋友，Aida如何打破文化界限，创造新生活？主持人谢韻仪走访Aida，特地为她烹调两道Aida妈妈的家常菜，准备给她一份大惊喜！.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, let's follow Pornsak & Cui Fang to explore the production process and cultural heritage of Japanese tofu, how Taiwanese fermented tofu manufacturer uses various ingredients to develop into different flavours and the cultivation of organic kailan in Malaysia and Taiwanese cabbage. (重)在这一集的《食材地图》节目中，跟随Pornsak和林翠芳一窥日本豆腐的制作过程和文化底蕴，看台湾豆腐乳厂家如何利用不同的食材融合，研制出不同口味的豆腐乳，了解台湾高丽菜和马来西亚有机芥蓝菜的种植。.

programme.title: 了不起的孩子（第二季） Fantastic Baby S2 - EP 8

programme.title: 料理人生 Magic Chef - EP 13
programme.desc: When David awakes in hospital, Xiao Xi and Tao Bao are overjoyed. Fang Ting reveals that the mysterious client would like to see him. David is not surprised to see that the client is Zhang You Ming. You Ming apologises to David and reveals that his corporation has to create a banquet for Gao Deng Shi, a Genius Chef from Hell. 大为苏醒过来，守在病床的晓溪和陶宝喜出望外。方婷说委托人想单独见他。大为并不意外委托人就是友铭。友铭正式向大为道歉，并解说集团收到了一项重要的委托，要为有“地狱厨神"之称的高登世设宴。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 69
programme.desc: Ep 56: Huijing overhears Taijun's conversation with Nayan and discovers to his shock, that the person whom he wedded is Nayan and not Daoxi. Ep 56: 泰俊在深夜时分与娜妍密谈，劝她停止复仇计划。辉京听到两人的对话，发现妻子其实是娜妍，不是道希。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 19
programme.desc: Ep 21The three grannies look for Zuodou at Shengzhu's house but get chased away by Shengzhu's mother. She tells them Shengzhu and Zuodou have separated. Zuodou discovers that Eric has been keeping Shengzhu's photo secretly. Eric admits that he has been carrying a torch for Shengzhu.Shengzhu needs quick cash and thus sells her car to her colleague cheaply.Ep 22Longmin does not approve his sister dating the spendthrift Shengtai, but he has to give his blessings to them as Tingwei is pregnant Ep 21三位奶奶来胜珠家想找作斗，却被胜珠的母亲赶走，并告诉她们胜珠和作斗已经分手了。艾瑞克偷藏胜珠照片的事情被作斗发现，只好承认自己暗恋过韩胜珠。胜珠为了减轻经济负担，只好将车便宜卖给同事。Ep 22龙民反对妹妹和败家子胜泰交往，但庭薇已经怀孕，所以龙民只好答应让他们在一起。胜珠的母亲也对庭薇这个不懂事的女生很反感，不想要接受这样的媳妇。作斗只愿意让胜珠拍自己的记录片。景淑劝胜珠帮吴赫拍记录片，但被她拒绝。.

programme.title: 一起生活吧 Marry Me Now - EP 21
programme.desc: Xuanhe shows Xiaoxie a photo of Meilian and CEO Yang together. Xiaoxie gets suspicious of her. Wenzhi is sure Zaiheng knows about his secret. After knowing Qingshou's mother did to her father in his shoe shop, Shanhe initiates a break up with Qingshou. 孝燮看到美莲和杨代表在一起的照片，并开始怀疑她。文植确信在亨知道了他的秘密。得知庆守妈妈对孝燮所作的事後，善荷决定与庆守分手。.

programme.title: 一起生活吧 Marry Me Now - EP 22
programme.desc: Xiaoxie sees the luxurious side of Meilian which makes him feels inferior. Meilian regrets not telling him the truth. Zaiheng feels depressed when Wenzhi makes life difficult for him in the company. 孝燮看到美莲奢华的一面，让他觉得自卑。美莲感叹遗憾没告诉孝燮。文植在公司里刁难在亨，后者大感郁闷。.

programme.title: 食尚玩家欢乐有够赞 Super Taste Super Joy - EP 9

programme.title: 再创世纪 Another Era - EP 22
programme.desc: Minxi feels frustrated as she finds out that her father has been keeping quiet about his lung cancer. Qitang returns to his company and feels uneasy about the changes in the office. Tiansheng realizes Qitang is still ambitious and decides to use it to his advantage. 海泉隐瞒患上肺癌又不就医，明晞气恼。启堂返回傲堂，对公司的转变均感碍眼。天生看出启堂仍充满野心，决定利用。.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 50
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

The center aims to act as a bridge to promote understanding between different institutions, especially d Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

programme.title: Bantal Buruk Saloma - EP 5
programme.desc: BANTAL BURUK SALOMA is a social drama about foster parenting that centres around family, life, love and forming relationships that lasts a lifetime. But it comes with serious challenges, especially when Aidilfitri approaches. Aidilfitri is a happy time for most kids. But for kids in orphanage or foster care, it is not easy. Some miss their parents. Lutfi is getting treatment but he could not be saved. Soon, Lutfi passes on and leaves Zaid and Rahmah utterly distraught. Zaid blames himself and becomes a changed man, leaving Rahmah and the kids baffled by his new behaviour. Meanwhile, Rafi and Suraya start to argue as to whether they should let Saloma meet with her mother since they are worried she might find out about Saloma's mother's condition. This leads to them falling out when Suraya insists Saloma should visit her mom. Saloma brings her ‘Bantal Buruk Saloma’ for her mom. Saloma’s mother thanks Suraya and Rafi for taking such good care of Saloma. Just as Saloma is connecting with her mom, Saloma’s mom passes away, leaving Saloma broken and distraught….

programme.desc: Nicknamed "Land Below The Wind" Sabah is the state that lies below the typhoon belt of East Asia and is not battered by any typhoons. programme.desc: Drama about Sofiya who has to live with her aunt after the death of her p parents. Umi Khadijah does not know that her husband Kamil has an evil intentions against Sofiya. He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Alysa is surprised to know she is going to be engaged with Tashriq that day. Kamil has secretly peep into Khadijah’s house and see their happiness from far. He regrets his mistakes and has come back with his wife whom he neglected. Meanwhile Arif meets Della whom he believes shared the same revenge as him. This is after Arif sees Della following Tashriq’s car. Both plan to ruin Alysa and Tashriq relationship.

programme.title: Hak Siapa - EP 2
programme.desc: Syariah law in Singapore today helps to resolve cases, covering different aspects of marriage, divorces, ancillary matters, custody and inheritance for the Muslim community. However, many will instead relate the Syariah law and court as messy, complex, complicated and emotionally draining; a long and tedious process that may impact the children. And because the issues discussed are sensitive, many tend to shy away from sharing their understanding or misunderstanding of the court and its process. Razak was supportive at first when Murni started to go back to work. He became jealous when Murni got reconnected with her friends, and soon became hooked on social media. Razak divorced Murni via text messages.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 5
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her. After 1 year in Kuala Lumpur, Luqman returns to his village announcing that he is now a qualified pilot. Zia is happy of his achievement and cannot wait to marry him. But what they don't know is that Luqman has been lying to all of them just to fulfil his fantasy of becoming a pilot.

Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Azraf's mother Diana is upset with his action of leaving her to elope with Raisya. She believed she has failed as a mother and regrets what she has done. While Azraf feels that his plan is working, his mother Diana became extremely depressed and was admitted to the hospital.

programme.desc: Pyan's has to abandon his medical studies to take care of his sick mother and sister who is still in school. He assumed the role as head of the family after his father died. programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 6
programme.desc: Iskandar brings Aisyah back to his home not as his wife but as a domestic helper. Desperate to save his mother's life, Rey embezzles his company's finances for her urgent operation. Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 8
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Muz & Ika is a light-hearted musical drama, an adaptation of the evergreen classic movie, Grease. Muz is a young city lad obsessed with Rock Kapak music, while Ika is a kampung girl who loves traditional music especially dondang sayang. Ika first meets Muz when he is on holiday in Mersing. Smitten by her, he at first pretends to be interested in traditional music. But pretense turns into deep affection for both Ika and her music. They part only to be reunited in Singapore when she leaves the kampung for a job in Singapore.To save face among his Rock Kapak friends, he pretends not to like Ika and her traditional music. Ika is devastated with his change of ways and heart. When he secretly tries to tell her his true feelings, she rejects him calling him a 'fake' and 'coward'.Would Muz stand up for himself regardless of his friends and reveal to the world his love for Ika and traditional music?

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 14

programme.desc: It portrays how the Malay community celebrating fasting month during Covid 19. Unlike the previous Ramadan, they are not able to visit the mosque as all mosques are closed. The programme will feature exercise routines by Wan Shamsury, healthy recipes by Chef Bob, doctor's interview with Dr Muhammad Iqbal Abdullah and skit segment with Suhaimi Yusof and Khairudin Samsudin. This series is anchored by Shahril Wahid.

programme.title: Poskad Dari Alhambra - EP 12
programme.desc: The appearance of unnamed postcards from Spain sets Nabilah off to an adventure to Cordoba but was greeted with bitter shock when she met her birth mother and discovered she was adopted. Sara opts to check out from the hospital against doctor’s advice. She intents to visit Natasha to bid her last goodbye before going back to Singapore. However, Natahsa has been long gone from the village….

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 16
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Raisya is troubled when she does not know how to cook. For that, she decides to enroll herself in a cooking class. But things take a turn when Azraf's mother sees her with another man and believe that she is having an affair.

programme.title: Pondok Itu Rumahku
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. The story of a poor family, Pak Sudin, his wife Rahimah and their five childrens. Syukri, Safuan, Sarimah, Salwa and their youngest son, Saiful. Conflict began when Pak sudin gives Syukri for adoption to a couple, Suhaimi and Zaleha. Pondok Itu Rumahku tells the story of a poor family of seven - Pak Sudin, his wife Rahimah and their five children, Syukri, Safuan, Sarimah, Salwa and Saiful. Due to his gambling addiction, Pak Sudin’s family is under a lot of hardship. Conflict begins when Pak Sudin decides to give Syukri up for adoption to a couple, Suhaimi and Zaleha, who live far away in the city.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 10
programme.desc: Rey's mother passes away in the hospital. Feeling distraught, Rey plans to seek revenge on Iskandar. Safira refuses to give up on her dreams of marrying Iskandar one day despite her mother's countless pleas. Aisyah feels jealous after noticing the many missed calls from Safira on Iskandar's phone. programme.title: Kekal Sihat Sentiasa Cergas - EP 3
programme.desc: KEKAL SIHAT SENTIASA CERGAS is a series targeted at the seniors in our society. Messages on how important it is to be safe during this period, how to improve their physical and mental well-being, and topics like proper eating habits and tips to healthier cooking are weaved into the episodic content in a light-hearted manner. There are also segments on exercising which we aim to encourage seniors to try indoors. The show aims to be entertaining, and yet informative,.

programme.desc: Catch your Favourite Oli 96.8 DJs, Ravi G & Haleema Live from the Radio Conty.

programme.title: Nandu - EP 5
programme.desc: Nandu is the story of a retrenched office girl who strikes out on her own to start a Fish Head Curry stall in an old neighbourhood coffeeshop. Her inexperience makes her an easy target and a disgruntled colleague schemes and plots extravagant ruses to throw her out of business.

programme.title: Azhagaai Irukkiraai Bayamaai Irukkiradhu
programme.desc: Mano loves Jo but when he realises that Jo is in love with Prem, he decides to help her in winning Prem's love. They succeed in their plan to separate Prem from his girlfriend Nandini.

programme.title: Super Samayal 4 - EP 29
programme.desc: This week on Super Samayal, Stephen joins Chef Ariffin to explore interesting rice and mutton recipes.

programme.title: Arokiam Aarambam- Get Fit With Me - Overcome COVID-19 S4 - EP 6
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: Velunatchi - EP 81
programme.desc: Velunachi, a young village girl decides to carry her father's lineage in Tamil martial art form, Silambam.

programme.title: Pincode - EP 3
programme.desc: A Backpacker brings you around India.

programme.title: Chutti Ulagam Sr.5 - EP 7
programme.desc: This is an informative-cum-entertaining programme tailored for young creative minds.

programme.title: Prabhu Deva (HD) - EP 0002&0003
programme.desc: What happens when a carefree, mischievous and unruly teenager befriends a bespectacled teen genius? Meet Prabhu and Deva. Two boys! Two personalities! One great friendship!

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 46
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Uravugal Sangamam - EP 96
programme.desc: The story revolves around the three families, bound by love, hate, care, jealousy and how they eventually conquer it all together.

programme.title: Indian Beat 11 (HD) - EP 5
programme.desc: Indian Beat is a bilingual magazine show that serves as an excellent platform by featuring the activities and events organized by the various Indian ethnic organizations around Singapore.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 52
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2016 - EP 14
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.desc: Doktor Pokok adalah sebuah rancangan yang bertemakan Kenali Penyakit Pelihara Tanaman yang dihoskan oleh Heliza Helmi. Episod kali ini memaparkan tentang variasi belimbing mstar1 atau belimbing bintang emas dari segi penjagaan dan juga cara penanamannya.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Episod ini memaparkan tentang pendakwah-pendakwah Islam yang terdiri daripada Cina Muslim di Malaysia. Terdapat beberapa tokoh pendakwah yang aktif menyebarkan kefahaman Islam di negara ini. Salah seorang yang ditemui oleh pengacara ialah Pengerusi Persatuan Cina Muslim Selangor, Saudara Syafiq Rafiqin Liow. Beliau menyatakan bahawa dakwah dalam kalangan mualaf sangat perlu kerana mualaf di Malaysia terdiri daripada pelbagai bangsa, keturunan dan adat resam.

programme.desc: Worn by Fillipina Presidents, and famous Hollywood personalities, like Quentin Tarantino, Tesoros is a brand synonymous to the culture of Philippines. programme.title: Deciphering India with Anjan Sundaram - EP 4
programme.desc: The Indian republic seems to be a remote concept in some parts of the country. In this episode Anjan travels across India to understand the concept of being Indian by meeting, erstwhile Kings, Separatists and head-hunting tribes who are redefining what it means to be Indian.

programme.title: Ian King Live

programme.title: Wingmen
programme.desc: Three elite BASE jumpers face the unknown on a global journey to find the best wingsuit and BASE jump spots. Three of the world's best wingsuit flyers set out on a global journey in search of perfect spots for proximity flying and BASE jumps. From Brazil to China, the trio face some of the most thrilling and challenging flights of their lives.

programme.title: Encounter at Ribbon Reef
programme.desc: Dr Dean Miller and his research crew embark on a five-day expedition to study the elusive Dwarf Minke whale. Researcher and scientist Dr Dean Miller and his crew embark on a five-day expedition to document and study the reclusive Dwarf Minke whale, a rare creature that makes a brief annual appearance at Australia's Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: The Race Track
programme.desc: At the Del Mar racetrack in San Diego, California, meet one of the few female jockeys in pro horse racing. Chantal Sutherland is one of the few female jockeys in horse racing. Accompany her to the legendary Del Mar racetrack in San Diego, California, as she meets the owners, trainers, and agents who can help her make an international name for herself.

programme.title: California's Comeback
programme.desc: Chris Benchetler skis his home slopes in California, USA, exploring previously unreachable areas. Chris Benchetler skis his home slopes at Mammoth Mountain in California, USA and the surrounding backcountry, exploring areas of the Sierra Nevada that have been inaccessible for years due to severe drought.

programme.title: It's Always Cloudy in British Columbia
programme.desc: Low visibility threatens the crew’s trip to British Columbia, but they’re determined to make the best of it. Chris Benchetler heads to British Columbia in search of choice snow on Canada's steep terrain, but a long spell of wet conditions and zero visibility threatens the crew’s dream of skiing perfect powder under clear skies.

programme.title: The fascination of cliff diving
programme.desc: Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt and Rhiannan Iffland discuss how important it is to stay sharp throughout the season. World Title winners Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt and Rhiannan Iffland discuss how important it is to stay sharp throughout the season when every event offers different platforms and water conditions.

programme.title: The perfect take-off
programme.desc: Finding the perfect take-off is the most important step in creating a good dive. Finding the perfect take-off is the most important step in creating a good dive. Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt and Rhiannan Iffland share the challenge of finding the placement for a take-off.

programme.title: The adventure begins
programme.desc: Meet three talented young American racers as they are thrust into the Rally Raid racing scene. Meet three young and talented American racers as they are thrust into the international Rally Raid racing scene: Seth Quintero, Blade Hildebrand and Mitch Guthrie Jr.

programme.title: The White Maze
programme.desc: It's 'mission impossible' for a pair of freeskiers who attempt to ski the highest peak in Eastern Siberia. A pair of freeskiers embark on their own personal 'mission impossible' by attempting to ski the highest peak in Eastern Siberia. Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr will push beyond their limits to conquer this mountain at the edge of the world.

programme.title: Israel
programme.desc: In Israel, the brothers explore Jerusalem and surf beaches in both Tel Aviv and the coastal town of Old Jaffa. In Israel, the brothers eat falafel and surf Hilton Beach in Tel Aviv before exploring the four quarters of the Old City in Jersualem and visiting the Separation Wall in the West Bank. Then it's time for surfing in the coastal town of Old Jaffa.

programme.title: Poo Bear: Afraid of Forever
programme.desc: From homeless to hit-maker, Poo Bear is the man behind some of pop music’s biggest smash hits. Jason 'Poo Bear' Boyd is the man responsible for some of pop music’s biggest hits. He went from homeless to hit-maker, but now he must fight to stay relevant while navigating a merciless music industry. Listen to: http://win.gs/Poo-Bear-Playlist.

programme.title: The deadline is looming
programme.desc: 'Mad' Mike Whiddett begins stripping down the Lamborghini in order to build it into a powerful ride. 'Mad' Mike Whiddett continues his mission to turn a Lamborghini into his dream car by stripping it down in order to build it into a powerful ride. The pressure is on as the deadline approaches.

programme.title: Daytona Bike Week
programme.desc: Ryan Sipes begins his journey through multiple motorcross disciplines at Daytona Bike Week. Ryan Sipes begins his journey through multiple motorcross disciplines. He starts out by racing all three of his unique bikes in Daytona, Florida, at Daytona Bike Week.

programme.title: Training for the Iron Giant
programme.desc: Ryan Sipes continues to prove his merit inside the stadium by racing in Tennessee and Arizona. Ryan Sipes continues to prove his merit inside the stadium before taking on Hard Enduro at Erzberg by racing supercross in Tennessee and Arizona.

programme.title: Tbilisi
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes to the country of Georgia to explore its beautiful capital city, Tbilisi. Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes to the country of Georgia to explore the cultural heritage of its beautiful capital city, Tbilisi. Follow along as Hubertus discovers the best spots this growing international destination has to offer.

programme.title: Queralt Castellet
programme.desc: Queralt Castellet has earned her place among the best snowboarders in the world. This is her story. Queralt Castellet's earned her place among the best snowboarders in the world, but it took a lot to get there. Get to know Queralt's story and the struggles she's overcome to achieve her dreams of snowboarding.

programme.title: Team game
programme.desc: Meet the mechanics who keep Kate Courtney and Finn Iles's bikes running smoothly. No elite-level mountain biker can achieve success without a team behind them to make sure their bike is set up to their personal preference and running the best it can. Meet the mechanics who work with World Cup rookies Kate Courtney and Finn Iles.

programme.title: Etnies: Chapters
programme.sub-title: Finding the world's best BMX spots
programme.desc: Enjoy groundbreaking riding captured in the most desirable BMX spots in the world. This team endured countless injuries and dedicated endless hours in search of the most desirable BMX spots in the world to bring you groundbreaking riding captured through the unique perspective of filmmakers Will Stroud and Mike Manzoori.

programme.title: Hoops4Hope
programme.desc: A former pro basketball player uses his sport to teach life skills in South Africa's most violent township. In the most violent township in South Africa, former pro basketball player and Red Bull Amaphiko Academy mentor Kita Thierry Matungulu is the director of Hoops4Hope, a foundation that teaches life skills by fostering a love for basketball.

programme.title: South of the Border
programme.desc: The teams head into Mexico ahead of race day with enough time for things to go wrong and no time to panic. With the start of the Baja 1000 just five days away, the teams are all in Ensenada, Mexico for the moment they've all been working toward. In the hours before the race starts something always goes wrong. Which teams can power through and overcome?
